title: Holy Grail of chicken has just been found by an unsuspecting reporter of the Chicago Tribune. Yes, that's right: The secret 11 herbs and spices in Colonel Sanders' Original Recipe chicken h
directions: o see if this recipe was really the secret KFC one, the Chicago Tribune tried it out on a couple batches of chicken. They found that it was seriously close to the real deal, but something was missingâ€”and that something turned out to be Accent (MSG), which they confirmed to be included in KFC's official chicken. The Accent can be sprinkled on after cooking, or added right into the mix.
